attributes.action: To banish gays to vietnam to fight in fight-to-the-death tournaments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I and all other homofobes would love to watch this on telly. bbc1 prefferably. i would want all telley rights to myself as i came up with this stunning idea.
Karl and Gregor are gay for each other.
they will be first to fight in our first deathmatch of ultimate ninja badass.
